questions.question: Fill in the gap with the simple past: The British army (WIN)____________ the battle.

choices.answer: won
winned
wan
wen

questions.question: Turn the sentence into a question: The British army won the battle.

choices.answer: Did the British army win the battle?
Did the British army won the battle?
Did the British army winned the battle?
Did the British army wan the battle?

questions.question: Turn the sentence into a negative: The British army won the battle.

choices.answer: The British army didn't win  the battle.
The British army didn't won  the battle.
The British army didn't winned the battle.
The British army didn't wan  the battle.
